titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (S. 2754) to derive human pluripotent stem cell lines using techniques that do not knowingly harm embryos.
Providing for consideration of the bill (S. 2754) to derive human pluripotent stem cell lines using techniques that do not knowingly harm embryos.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-578, by Mr. Gingrey.

Rule provides for consideration of S. 2754 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 215.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 952, H. Res. 924 is laid on the table.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of S. 2754 (Alternative Pluripotent Stem Cell Therapies Enhancement Act).
